name: Phase Drift [Oscilloscope]
description:
Arcade time trial racer for your oscilloscope.

Drift through three warps to break into a new dimension.

You can stay there as long as you go faaast!

Arrows move, z/x drifts, space brakes, R restarts.

xInput gamepads are supported.

Made for Global Game Jam 2022: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/phase-drift-8
